discovery.name: http-title
discovery.description: Fetches page titles from HTTP services.
discovery.example:
# Example: nmap --script http-title -p80 example.com
80/tcp open  http
|_http-title: Example Domain

discovery.name: ftp-anon
discovery.example:
# Example: nmap --script ftp-anon -p21 example.com
21/tcp open  ftp
|_ftp-anon: Anonymous FTP login allowed

vuln.name: ssl-cert
vuln.example:
# Example: nmap --script ssl-cert -p443 example.com
| ssl-cert: Subject: commonName=example.com

vuln.name: smb-os-discovery
vuln.description: Discovers remote OS information via SMB.
vuln.example:
# Example: nmap --script smb-os-discovery -p445 example.com
| smb-os-discovery:
|   OS: Windows 10

brute.name: dns-brute
brute.description: Performs DNS subdomain brute force enumeration.
brute.example:
# Example: nmap --script dns-brute example.com
| dns-brute:
|   mail.example.com - 192.0.2.3
